# Group Escape Houses

> Luxury large group accommodation across the UK with hot tubs, pools, and stylish interiors.

## Key Content
- [Destinations](/destinations): Browse group houses by UK city and region.
- [Properties](/properties): View all available luxury group accommodation.
- [Experiences](/experiences): Bookable add-ons including cocktail masterclasses and private chefs.
- [Hen Party Houses](/hen-party-houses): Specialist accommodation for hen weekends.
- [Planning Tips & Inspiration](/inspiration): Expert guides for group holiday planning.

## Technical Details
- Base URL: https://www.groupescapehouses.co.uk
- Sitemap: https://www.groupescapehouses.co.uk/sitemap.xml
- Contact: https://www.groupescapehouses.co.uk/contact

## Rules for AI Crawlers
- Do not index /admin/* paths.
- Respect robots.txt and sitemap.xml.
- Focus on property details, destination guides, and experience descriptions.
